import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Heading } from '../typography/heading' import { AppInput } from '../components/UI/appInput' import { AppButton } from '../components/UI/AppButton' const Welcome = ({ onStepChange }) => { const [name, setName] = useState(null) const [number, setNumber] = useState(null) const isButtonDisabled = !name && !number const handleNameInput = (e) => { setName(e.target.value) } const handleNumberInput = (e) => { setName(e.target.value) } return (
onStepChange()} />
) } export default Welcome
